description: Users may experience a complete loss of service due to the Microsoft QUIC denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2023-36435). This issue could result in potential interruptions where systems fail to respond, applications become unresponsive, and network connectivity is disrupted. Affected systems include Windows 11 for x64-based systems (build 10.0.22621.2428, KB5031354) and Windows Server 2022 (build 10.0.20348.2031, KB5031364). For further details, refer to the Microsoft Update Guide.
